text:
[Verse 1]
Summer sun so bright
Kids in line they wait
Ice cold treats delight
Lemonade tastes great

[Verse 2]
Coins in plastic cups
Sugar sweet and gold
Neighbors fill it up
Stories being told

[Chorus]
Lemonade so sweet and tart
Fill your cup and fill your heart
Every sip a sunny breeze
Brings you down to your knees

[Verse 3]
Hands so sticky now
Laughing in the yard
Sweat upon my brow
Runnin wild and hard

[Verse 4]
Yellow dreams so fine
Candy in the sun
Childhood magic time
Till the day is done

[Bridge]
Pour it out don't let it end
Time with you my dear old friend
In this moment we will stay
As the sun fades away
title: Lemonade Stand
